Structs/AnimationLayerDSL.html#/s:5Lotus.name: runAnimation(_:)
Structs/AnimationLayerDSL.html#/s:5Lotus.abstract: Returns AnimationMaker object in closure that can be used to set up animation which would run after calling this method

Structs/AnimationLayerChainDSL.html#/s:5.name: then(_:)
Structs/AnimationLayerChainDSL.html#/s:5.abstract: Returns AnimationMaker object in closure that can be used to set up animation which would run after previous animation will have finished.

Structs/AnimationLayerChainDSL.html.name: AnimationLayerChainDSL
Structs/AnimationLayerChainDSL.html.abstract: An object that provides method to declare and run chained animations

Structs/AnimationLayerDSL.html.name: AnimationLayerDSL
Structs/AnimationLayerDSL.html.abstract: An object that provides method to declare and run animations

Protocols/AnimatableItem.html.name: AnimatableItem
Protocols/AnimatableItem.html.abstract: A type that can be used for animations

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC5Lot.name: lotus
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC5Lot.abstract: An object that can be used to run Lotus animation. Returns base layer’s Lotus object.

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC5L.name: lotus
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC5L.abstract: An object that can be used to run Lotus animations.

Enums/ScaleType.html#/s:5Lotus9ScaleType.name: width
Enums/ScaleType.html#/s:5Lotus9ScaleType.abstract: Indicates that scaling animation would change width via transform.

Enums/ScaleType.html#/s:5Lotus9ScaleType.name: height
Enums/ScaleType.html#/s:5Lotus9ScaleType.abstract: Indicates that scaling animation would change height via transform

Enums/MotionType.html#/s:5Lotus10MotionT.name: vertical
Enums/MotionType.html#/s:5Lotus10MotionT.abstract: Indicates that motion animation would change position’s Y coordinate

Enums/MotionType.html#/s:5Lotus10MotionT.name: horizontal
Enums/MotionType.html#/s:5Lotus10MotionT.abstract: Indicates that motion animation would change position’s X coordinate

Enums/EasingType.html.name: EasingType
Enums/EasingType.html.abstract: Easing functions specify the rate of change of a parameter over time.

Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html#/s:5.name: during(_:)
Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html#/s:5.abstract: Sets animation’s duration time. Returns AnimationMakerEditable object that can be used to set up animation capabilities.

Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html#/s:5.name: delay(_:)
Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html#/s:5.abstract: Sets animation’s delaying time. Returns AnimationMakerEditable object that can be used to set up animation capabilities.

Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html#/s:5.name: ease(_:)
Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html#/s:5.abstract: Sets animation’s easing function. Returns AnimationMakerEditable object that can be used to set up animation capabilities.

Classes/AnimationMakerAnimatable.html#/s.name: to(_:)
Classes/AnimationMakerAnimatable.html#/s.abstract: Sets animation’s final or destination value. Returns AnimationMakerEditable object that can be used to set up animation capabilities.

Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.name: motion
Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.abstract: An object that describes position animation on X and Y axes.

Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.name: motion(_:)
Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.abstract: An object that describes position animation on axis passed as argument.

Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.name: scaling
Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.abstract: An object that describes scale animation in width and height.

Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.name: scaling(_:)
Classes/AnimationMaker.html#/s:5Lotus14A.abstract: An object that describes scale animation on dimension passed as argument.

Classes/AnimationMaker.html.name: AnimationMaker
Classes/AnimationMaker.html.abstract: An object that can be used to set up animation’s type.

Classes/AnimationMakerAnimatable.html.name: AnimationMakerAnimatable
Classes/AnimationMakerAnimatable.html.abstract: An object that can be used to set up animation’s final value or destination.

Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html.name: AnimationMakerEditable
Classes/AnimationMakerEditable.html.abstract: An object that can be used to set up animation’s capabilities.
